Reviews.Title: Nice one
Reviews.Author: MS
Reviews.Content: Nice camera ,excellent for the price that you get it for . Pictures are quite crisp and nice . Totally satisfied with the value and quality of the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera For the Price!
Reviews.Author: T. Shrader "up all night"
Reviews.Content: This Kodak camera takes clean, clear pictures and is super easy to use.  It is small enough to fit in your pocket, yet feels durable enough to take a few drops on the concrete.  The battery life is ok, lasting all day when using it to take pictures of the kids at Disney World.  The only drawback is you can't use AA batteries if they do die.  I would plan on buying a backup battery just for this reason.  I wouldn't hesitate to purchase this camera if you are looking for a great little pocket cam that does better than your smart phone camera.  I wouldn't recommend this if you are someone who is into photography and looking for a point & shoot camera as there are better options available, but for double or even quadruple the pricetag.  Most of us, like myself, want clean, clear pictures of our friends and family doing crazy stuff.  This camera is perfect that!As for the software, I do not use it, so I can't review that.  I use Windows 7 and just download the pictures from the SD card onto my PC.

Reviews.Title: Great Price! But poor focus.
Reviews.Author: Harry Tuazon
Reviews.Content: This camera's functions and specifications is excellent for 50 dollars! However, focusing seems to be a big problem. Just the slight movements even from a steady hand gives a blurry picture.You can alternatively use the "Sport" setting to sacrifice some quality for a less blurry picture.I do want to point out that the quality is really good only if the camera is immobilized such as on a tripod, etc.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for black friday price
Reviews.Author: AR
Reviews.Content: I have been taking some pictures with the camera and the pictures look good, nice and clear. Just know what setting the camera is on if it is in landscape and your taking a picture of something moving the shutter will be late, there is a setting for stuff that moves. The camera feels pretty durable but still light enough to carry. The battery is rechargeable which I would prefer since most likely I would have the camera in my pocket and don't want to carry AA's. It's a simple camera, if you are looking for something professional this is not it, but if you want something simple to capture everyday moments this is it. It's simple to use comes with a wristband. For the price and the simplicity this is a good camera.

Reviews.Title: No Flash
Reviews.Author: Laura B
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera to give to my teenage daughter for Christmas.  She was thrilled.  After taking it out and charging the battery she tried to take pictures.  We could not get the flash to work at all.  We tried everything.  Had it on Auto flash; flash on; red-eye reduction - nothing.  We are sending it back to amazon.

Reviews.Title: Expected a lot more..
Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: I had both a Kodak Easyshare M530 12 MP Digital Camera with 3x Wide Angle Optical Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Red) and a Nikon Coolpix S3000 12.0 MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Electronic Vibration Reduction (VR) Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Plum) for a few months and found them both to be pretty awesome. When I first saw the Kodak M23 on Amazon, my eyes lit up. A 14 megapixel point and shoot digital camera with 5x optical zoom for $59! I bought two! I thought to myself, Hey, it's new, it's an upgrade, it has to be better than my M530". Nope.I received my package and the camera's packaging was very simplistic, which I liked. Included is the camera, a wrist strap, the lithium-ion battery, a micro usb adapter and the wall outlet for the adapter, which..is pretty big. When I took out the camera itself, I was pleasantly surprised. I used a word to describe the camera that I rarely use AT ALL; "Gorgeous". The photo here does not do the camera any justice whatsoever. It is a bright shade of red in a high gloss finish and a chrome bezel (?) around the housing of the lens and the small size of the device gives the illusion that the LCD screen is larger than it actually is. Very sleek and sexy.I put in the battery pack, turned the camera on and was ready to shoot. What I appreciated right off the bat was how FAST it powered on. The lens just pops right out, literally. Of course for a low-budget digital camera, I didn't expect the camera to have a 'Retina Display' but the resolution is nice. I snapped a picture and was disappointed. The pictures come out very bright, almost too bright. On the computer the pictures look average, pretty decent, but when zoomed in to show the actual resolution of the photo, there is very little detail shown. It's as if you took an 8mp photo and stretched it to 14.1mp. My M530 wasn't giving me DSLR quality, but I found that is showed a lot of detail. When it comes to Smart Capture...if this is what people consider 'smart', we live in a confused world. When taking photos in smart capture mode, it's almost as if the camera has no idea of what is going on or what it is trying to capture. I took pictures out in daylight which were better but still lacked detail. Forget about zooming, it gets confused.I don't know if my standards are too high or if i'm being too picky, maybe I need to up my budget to the mid to upper range models, but this camera just disappointed me in more ways that one...basically in every way aside from the asthetics and its speed. This camera is pretty snappy (pun intended..don't judge me, lol) but that's pretty much it. There are 17 scenes to choose from:Portrait (1), Sport (2), Landscape (3), Close Up - which is a JOKE (4), Sunset (5), Backlight and Candlelight (6, 7), Children (8), Bright (9), Fireworks (10), Self Portrait (11), Night Portrait and Night Landscape (12, 13), High ISO (14), Panorama Left-Right and Panorama Right-Left (15, 16) and Blur Reduction (17)The M530 however had 22 which included 16 previously mentioned (aside from Backlight), Snow (17), Beach (18), Text- Which I LOVED for close ups (19),Flower (20), Museum/Manner (21) and Panning Shot (22)Would I recommend this camera?For those who appreciate just the looks: YesFor those who just want to take pictures: YesFor those who would like their photographs to have a decent amount of detail: NoFor those who like to have many options and scenes (that work): NoFor those who like to take close up photos: NoBy the way, I should make note that I love the feel of the buttons and the re-vamped design of the door for the memory card/battery. Very Nikon Coolpix-esque.**UPDATE**To add insult to injury, the camera's ability to charge has flown OUT the window. It will no longer turn on unless it is plugged in to charge. Talk about 'portable' -____- All i'm getting is a steady red light indicating that the battery is charged when in fact, it's completely dead.

Reviews.Title: Excellent little entry camera with surprising features
Reviews.Author: kk "kk"
Reviews.Content: It's a nice entry camera, but I was surprised that it has advanced features like 5x Optical zoom and 14 mega pixels. Also has ISO up to 1000 and shoots video up to 2GB! Great for teenagers or something to take on vacation in the pocket.

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Lacey Blosser
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this product. It takes great pictures and has many different settings, edit, crop..options. I would definitely recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: go ahead and buy
Reviews.Author: Maria C
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my mom, I had just purchased another brand for me, more expensive point and shoot so I thought, well, Ill buy this and it wont be good. turns out this camera was wonderfully great and the more expensive one I bought for me sucked.you will not regret buying this item since it makes great pictures, easy to carry around, uses an average memory card you can fit into all computers.

Reviews.Title: it was good while it lasted
Reviews.Author: andrew t. schwartz
Reviews.Content: I made it through several years using this camera, up until it went down with me in a boat, not it don't work so good.

Reviews.Title: I GOT THE LEMON!
Reviews.Author: J B Shaw
Reviews.Content: Sadly, though this camera was a super little camera which took excellent photos, I have to report that it quit one day before I was going abroad for a long vacation.  Thank goodness it was the day before and not the day after.  I had to rush out and buy another camera.  By the time I returned from my vacation it was just too late to return it under a one year guarantee.  I know I didn't pay a lot for it but it is sad that it quit so early, especially as I liked the photos and the ease of operation.  I think I got the 'lemon'

Reviews.Title: Love Kodak
Reviews.Author: D. Tweedy "Movie nut"
Reviews.Content: This is my second Kodak like this. The first one I gave away after ordering a more expensive camera that had a longer zoom. I have had two other camera since that I have not liked. I love this camera. For an amatuer like me, that just wants easy to use and good quality, it is the perfect camera. It's sad that Kodak has stopped making these because they are the best point and shoots, bar none. I am so pleased to have my old friend back! Thinking about getting a second one to put up just in case....:)

Reviews.Title: NIce camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Laura Aguilar
Reviews.Content: I really love it... This camera takes nice pictures, even better than cameras more expensive, that's why I love it

Reviews.Title: Bought as a gift
Reviews.Author: fozzy
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift for my sister, who goes through cameras almost yearly... Between losing them, dropping them in water, or just them breaking she has had bad luck. This one will be a year old on Christmas, and so far its been lasting for her. Maybe she has just learned to take better care of her things, or maybe its a good camera? But she hasn't had any problems.

Reviews.Title: rip off
Reviews.Author: Mom
Reviews.Content: I purchase this product in Nov. I couldn't use it by the end of Jan.Tried to get help from Kodak, discontinued product unable to help!!This is ridiculous!!  I clearly have a defective product and yet they won't help...Beware of KODAK

Reviews.Title: Kodak EasyShare is easy and fun to use
Reviews.Author: Princess Reader
Reviews.Content: I spent many months thinking about, looking at and reading reviews in consideration of purchasing a digital camera. I landed on and purchased the Kodak EasyShare M23. I do like the camera it is easy to use and the pictures are clear and bright. Downloading the photo's onto the computer is simple. I have not taken a photo to share as of yet so have not had a chance to use this feature but am looking forward to being able to use this option in the future. Since this was the first digital camera I have purchased and I am not all that familiar with digital cameras I have to say I was disappointed in the description which indicated the camera has internal memory but did not indicate this would only hold about 4 photo's. Being unfamiliar with digital cameras I figured the internal memory would be all I needed then found out I needed to purchase an SD memory card. I think the description needs to be more specific in regards to the internal memory. Luckily I did not purchase the camera for a trip or special event since I had to wait additional time for the memory card. In closing I am happy I purchased the Kodak EasyShare and look forward to taking many photo's.

Reviews.Title: Broken - won't charge
Reviews.Author: Candy
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter for Christmas. We charged it Christmas Day and she used it to take pictures. The battery ran down and when we plugged it back in to charge it again it wouldn't charge. Upon examination I found that the tiny slot that holds the charge cord had come loose and wouldn't hold the cord in the proper place for the camera to charge.I contacted Kodak on December 29, 2011. They agreed that the camera would be repaired under warranty, and said that they would email me shipping instructions. I have contacted them multiple times over the past month and have yet to receive the shipping instructions for the camera.I am extremely disappointed in the lack of service from Kodak. This will be the last item I EVER purchase with the Kodak brand.

Reviews.Title: Kokak Camera...does the job
Reviews.Author: C.Raw
Reviews.Content: This camera is a step up from the camera we were using previously, but it has a few quirks.  It is fairly difficult to take a picture without it turning out blurry.  I think I have it down now, but ideally it would just be point and shoot - no tricks.  My wife is the primary user of the camera and seems to be happy with it.Overall, it was worth the purchase price.

Reviews.Title: Nice product for the price
Reviews.Author: prettyteacher
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my eleven year old.  She loves it.  It is easy to use and reasonably priced.

Reviews.Title: Decent
Reviews.Author: Nessa
Reviews.Content: I bought this item because I lost my previous camera and I needed something before the holidays. This camera is pretty good, especially for the price. I like the quality of the images, and the shutter speed is also fast. All in all, this is a decent camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera!
Reviews.Author: S
Reviews.Content: I am no photographer. Just wanted a camera to point and shoot and this one does that perfectly. The pictures are clear and crisp and so far no problems. However, ensure that you order a mediacard as the camera's actually memory is quite small.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easyshare M23 14 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Doris JOnes
Reviews.Content: Camera serves purpose for which I purchased.  It works well and has the features as advertised.  Photos are for the most part quite clear.

Reviews.Title: WONDERFUL
Reviews.Author: MSW
Reviews.Content: I thank amazon for this wonderful item that they had on sale.  The kodak camera is the best thing i have ever purchased yet so far on amazon.  Thank you again, i am enjoying it.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: mackenzie01
Reviews.Content: Great camera package for the money. Great starter camera for someone who is not electronically inclined. Give it a try!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: So far....so good! Easy to use. Small but good viewer size. Buttons to turn on, etc are very tiny and it is harder than texting!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: bizzymom
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to have a small, lightweight one to throw in my diaper bag. As a mom of 2 toddlers, having a camera on hand AT ALL TIMES is imperative! I love it. It is lightweight, yet sturdy. Easy to use and the share button makes sharing pics with friends & family a no brainer! I ordered this on Cyber Monday and have used it a million times already since receiving it. Great camera, great value!

Reviews.Title: Satisfied.
Reviews.Author: Mols
Reviews.Content: This has been great. The camera was a great deal. It came with everything it said it would and arrived in about 2 days. I had no hassles. Overall great experience.

Reviews.Title: Christmas order
Reviews.Author: Colleen A. Bennard
Reviews.Content: Came as expected.  Timely manner.  Easy to work and understand.  Value for money. Ordered camera case with it.  Made a perfect set.

Reviews.Title: Great first camera
Reviews.Author: Jaren
Reviews.Content: This camera is very nice for someone who doesn't take a lot of pictures. It has good battery life and takes very decent photos. While I wouldn't give it to take professional photos,its still a good camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: jared
Reviews.Content: Very affordable, A lot of great features.  Would have liked to have a manual in box instead of a website for instructions.Overall very good buy!

Reviews.Title: EasyShare
Reviews.Author: dee
Reviews.Content: I'm no photographer, however I really needed a camera as we are planning a big vacation and I wanted pictures.  My daughter is a photographer so I have had her looking for something for me that I could easily use.  She suggested this camera for people like me, I also bought one for my granddaughter for Christmas, and she's 7 so this tells you just how easy this camera is to work.  It does take great pictures, however I took a video Christmas night of my cat's playing with their toy's and it really wasn't the best of quality.  I am in hopes that daylight will be better quality for video but haven't tried it yet.

Reviews.Title: Not very good for a Kodak
Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: I expected better from a Kodak camera so I'm glad I got this one on sale.  The pictures are blurry and difficult to focus especially if they are more than a few feet away.  The camera uses an internal battery so you can't just swap it out for AA's when it runs out.  The build quality of the camera is nice but that doesn't mean it takes good pics.

Reviews.Title: Camera OK shipping less than desirable
Reviews.Author: Merlin
Reviews.Content: Hello,Just a quick note about the Camera we bought. This is the second Kodak Easyshare in the family so we knew what to expect from the Camera, what we didnt expect was the shoddy way it was shipped,In a box that was 5x to big and not enough padding to keep it from being tossed around. the Exterior box was in rough shape and so was the inside box, we tested and the Camera itself is OK but I am disapointed in the way it shipped.

Reviews.Title: damaged
Reviews.Author: Johnny Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: defective product... very deseccionante really the product that you buy with the confidence that is a quality product.... the product arrived damaged... is a shame now that I lost my money... it is recommended not to buy it...

Reviews.Title: wow blury pics over 20 feet
Reviews.Author: LoveGodandLoveLife
Reviews.Content: junk i will never buy another. focus doesn't work at all, all the setting nothing works, usesa kodak batt. not AA DON'T buy

ProductInfo.Features:
5X wide optical zoom lens
Kodak's Share button lets you choose your favorite sharing destination, e-mail address, or Kodak Pulse Display
On-camera features including editing, cropping, auto picture rotation, and undo-delete
Advanced video features include audio capture, playback, on-camera editing, and prints from video
SD/SDHC Card compatibility, Kodak's Face Recognition, multiple scene and color modes, Li-Ion rechargeable batteries and in-camera charging
ProductInfo.Name: Kodak EasyShare M23 14 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Red)
